        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="18719" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="18719" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.95</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1093">1,093</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="87"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Vaara</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. <b>Vaara</b> was launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is Bertrand Duchaufour. Top notes are Quince, Rose Water, Saffron, Coriander and Carrot Seeds; middle notes are Rose, Peony, Magnolia and Freesia; base notes are Honey, White Musk, Cedar, Sandalwood, Benzoin and Tonka Bean. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html"                         <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">7</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Fakey or not natural smell
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>

                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">7</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    No freshness or depth
                </div>
                    </div>
    </div>

                                 src="https://fimgs.net/photogram/p180/za/pl/VWrB6CMSswmy0bkO.jpg">
                        </a>

            </div>
            </div>
</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="18719"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.223.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Quince-223.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Quince</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; </pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.105.jpg" style="width: 4.9rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Rose-105.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Rose</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.96720444101136; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.155.jpg" style="width: 3.75rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Peony-155.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Peony</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.8594681029756; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.147.jpg" style="width: 3.075rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Magnolia-147.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Magnolia</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.8594681029756; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.94.jpg" style="width: 3.075rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Freesia-94.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Freesia</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; community and you will be able to add your own reviews.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5 -->

height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2031437" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2031437" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emilyrf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1923493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emilyrf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2031437ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2031437" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1923493">Emilyrf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-15">01/15/24 05:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful juicy floral with just enough spice and wood to add depth and complexity. Dries down to a perfectly creamy feminine clean floral without being soapy or having cloying heavy floral notes, really superbly blended, versatile with excellent silage and longevity</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="2031437"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=2031437#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995973" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995973" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scents &amp; blooms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1485244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scents &amp; blooms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-M/Le-Soleil-Brille-23748.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23748.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Soleil Brille"title="Le Soleil Brille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995973ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995973" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1485244">Scents &amp; blooms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-08">12/08/23 10:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I still have an old bottle with me which I used yesterday! Oh my word! Stunningly beautiful! <br />
<br />
A fragrance fit for a Princess! Incidentally it was named after Princess Vaara of Jodhpur,Rajasthan,India. The blurb on Penhaligon website says  The Maharajas granddaughter is born into luxury. Succulent quince, fragrant roses, and wood warmed by the midday sun. Vibrant Rajasthan, captured in an eau de parfum. Tempered by stately elegance.<br />
<br />
Years ago I went to India &amp; visited this region of India &amp; the Palace, a magical place! Wearing this scent yesterday took me back! <br />
<br />
Scent notes on my skin are a beautiful creamy rose with hints of sandalwood &amp; saffron. It is a rose but not like other rose perfumes. Soft,creamy,fresh with hints of spice! Utterly divine!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1995973"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1995973#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1979729" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1979729" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent.guide"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1406103.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent.guide" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1979729ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1979729" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103">Scent.guide</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-18">11/18/23 14:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful fresh and slightly spicy rose with lots of clean and bright citruses. The heart of the composition is more soft, musky and sweet, but still quite spicy and refreshing. The most dominant spice is cold coriander, but I can also smell tons of earthy and vaxy carrots seeds. Such a complex and brilliant fragrance. <br />
<br />
But white floral notes could be a bit cloying, so be aware.<br />
<br />
Follow me on IG: scent.guide</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1979729"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1979729#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1913214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1913214" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tanaC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.75237.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tanaC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1913214ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1913214" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237">tanaC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-28">08/28/23 00:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Vaara by Penheligon's<br />
(H22D5A, April 2015, 50 ml. for 55 usd)<br />
<br />
First Impression<br />
<br />
I blind-buy Vaara out of curiosity as my brother do the declutter sales.<br />
As the price is not really bad, I blind-bought this as a rose-lover and intrigued by composition.<br />
<br />
I danced around, I am so happy.<br />
Varra is the hit on my nail for rose lover like me.<br />
<br />
It happened that, I applied Xerjoff's Alexandria II before Vaara a few hours.<br />
As I am not really sure rather I wish to keep this bottle.<br />
I have Alexandria III which is truly ok but the rose, for me just not enough.<br />
<br />
I got Vaara, I spray him on top of Alexandria II a bit.<br />
And Boom! Miracle happened. This is just the perfect Rose-Oud I am looking for.<br />
The dewy Rose-Oud fragrance of Dream.<br />
<br />
Vaara, alone is not really magical.<br />
It can be describe as Dior Forever &amp; Ever with a drop of spicy.<br />
It is Rose water scent with hint of honey and spiciness.<br />
And the scent develop Rose is more stronger but never pass the point I would call this<br />
Rose fragrance, It is rose-water scent. But A bit of Groovy honey in base is quite worthy.<br />
<br />
For the price I got, I will keep her as Alexandria II / III topper.<br />
The little treasure form the brave blind-buy.<br />
<br />
Score : 9/10 (as topper 11/10 another keeper in my collection)<br />
Longevity : TBA<br />
Projection : TBA<br />
Classification : <br />
Summary :</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1913214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1913214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1906394" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1906394" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1906394ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1906394" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-19">08/19/23 15:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sad to hear this just got discontinued. So I am stocking up on extra bottles. Quince usually comes across as very sour to my nose in perfumes (see Dolcia by Detaille, and My Burberry fragrances). But this one is delightfully sweet, a little bit tart, with the right amount of spice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1906394"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1906394#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent1905697" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1905697" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sunnyviolets"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1459768.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sunnyviolets" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1905697ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1905697" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459768">sunnyviolets</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-18">08/18/23 18:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm not put together enough to wear this.<br />
<br />
This is most certainly for a classy, elegant, well-traveled, regal woman. As it was intended.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1905697"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1905697#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1814228" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1814228" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Punkrockbebop"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170096"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1170096.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Punkrockbebop" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Alkemia-Perfumes/Falling-Stars-on-Winter-Solstice-54086.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54086.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Falling Stars on Winter Solstice"title="Falling Stars on Winter Solstice"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1814228ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1814228" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170096">Punkrockbebop</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-21">04/21/23 10:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Vaara is a transparent spiced rose water and magnolia paired with bright, sparkling quince/pear over a soapy, creamy, powdery sandalwood base. The light touch of carrot seed lends a spicy, and slightly earthy, fleshy quality. This is expensive luxurious soap and rich, creamy, moisturizing bath lotion with an exotic spice market vibe. Very lovely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1814228"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1814228#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1799448" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not enough rose notes for what I was looking for :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1799448"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1799448#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1790850" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1790850" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="naushin17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1567353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="naushin17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Perris-Monte-Carlo/Cacao-Azteque-46841.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46841.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cacao Azteque"title="Cacao Azteque"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1790850ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1790850" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1567353">naushin17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-23">03/23/23 12:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Vaara has been my go to scent since 2017. it's playful, flirty and a little bit sensual. Gives me the impression of a rajkumari running through the palace on a summer evening - peonies, roses, carrots (I know, carrot, but it plays really well on my skin and adds more depth to an otherwise overly-floral scent) and coriander.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1790850"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1790850#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1674521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1674521" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="specialfairygirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1112296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="specialfairygirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-for-Her-38497.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38497.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus for Her"title="Aventus for Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1674521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1674521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112296">specialfairygirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-26">10/26/22 06:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ohh, Vaara Vaara. This relationship started out so well but went downhill fast, even though I wanted to love it so much. To be honest I loved it when I got it. But it was years ago and I'm really struggling to finish the (small) bottle. Not that its a bad perfume, but it is loud, heavy and strong and there is nowhere I can wear it to. It is way too much for work, it is not sexy enough for a date, it is too much for a work dinner. I have opera tickets with my friend in November. Maybe I will wear it for that. Definitely. It will be good there. It is also a soap - y scent which is very spicy. For brave souls only. On my skin its everywhere, you know when someone gets into the lift and his or her perfume just fills it. It is THAT kind, but for me its not something I want to smell that strongly. I think if you are considering it, a sample first is a good idea.. For me it is too much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1674521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1674521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1641393" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
