padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1237997">Nimyan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-19">05/19/20 04:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A secret garden in an India palace...fountain, melons, pears, saffron, unnamable sweet flowers under the bright sunlight. Energetic yet elegant. Very lovely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1177556"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1177556#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1161196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1161196" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="molly1217"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232898"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1232898.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="molly1217" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Doblis-4659.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4659.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Doblis"title="Doblis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1161196ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1161196" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232898">molly1217</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-05">04/05/20 22:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Although India is the name of Princess perfume, the smell is not heavy, gaudy, but also not really spicy.<br />
The beginning of the rich sweet fruit, the quiet gentle sandalwood, cedar end, the middle of peony, rose, freesia holding hands jumping Waltz, Vaara is like flying in flowers in colorful saris. The biggest bright spot Vaara, than the rare saffron spice, and it was added to make this a flagship exotic perfume is more unusual. In concept, is actually quite easy to start with a "light oriental" ah ......</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1161196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1161196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1146935" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1146935" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MarchAZ"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209507"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1209507.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MarchAZ" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Thameen/The-Cora-47282.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47282.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Cora"title="The Cora"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1146935ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1146935" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209507">MarchAZ</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-02-19">02/19/20 06:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this so much I don't even want to wear it, I feel like it is so precious and do not want to waste a single drop. I feel special when I wear it and did I say it was a blind buy? (I am doing a lot of blind buys lately  based on Fragrantica reviews so thanks guys!) I was so attracted to the notes and I think this is what makes it more special for me as I did not previously have a perfume with notes of coriander, carrot seeds and quince. I am not sure of longevity yet, it does not last more than 3-4 hours, but I like it so much that I do not mind carrying this little precious bottle in my handbag</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1146935"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1146935#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1131611" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1131611" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="esikko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/209832"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.209832.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="esikko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clarins/Eau-Dynamisante-2825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Dynamisante"title="Eau Dynamisante"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1131611ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1131611" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/209832">esikko</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-01-06">01/06/20 12:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I know it is super subjective, but for me this perfume means Springtime, Easter, April sunshine. There is something very sunny, innocent and joyful in this perfume. I do not mean sickening silliness. There is nothing artificially sweet in Vaara - on the contrary, there is something bittersweet, and i mean this more emotionally than olfactory. I think about movies based on  Jane Austen's novels, childhood days in the garden, about saffron flowers covering the  meadows in Tatra mountains. I love the unique smell of quince fruit - Penhaligon's did an excellent job, again, in interpreting Nature's best perfumes. It is certainly not like any other perfume I know.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1131611"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1131611#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1122418" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1122418" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfume Beginners"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092780"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1092780.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfume Beginners" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ormonde-Jayne/Ta-if-4922.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4922.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ta'if"title="Ta'if"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1122418ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1122418" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092780">Perfume Beginners</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-12-07">12/07/19 08:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first impression of the perfume is floral spicy and it doesn't change even after smelling it for so many times. It is one of my spring and daytime favourites as it is unique and elegant. The floral part seems like a combination of white flowers that I can hardly distinguish one from each other, not even the rose as suggested by many others, let alone other flowers.<br />
<br />
In the very beginning, I don't like it very much because of the spiciness. I love floral scents and I like the floral vibe of this perfume from first smell, however I found the spiciness totally destroys the floral.<br />
<br />
About 2 years later, I did a fragrance test in one of the Penhaligon's branches to see what fragrances do I prefer and the staff recommended Vaara according to my result from the test. Surprisingly, I found it super amazing and bautiful, especially with the spicy vibe probably provided by quince. I immediate bought a bottle and sprayed it every day for some time. Until now, it is still my top favourites.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1122418"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1122418#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1096173" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1096173" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stefafra"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/665517"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.665517.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stefafra" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fragonard/Fleur-d-oranger-4946.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4946.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fleur d'oranger"title="Fleur d'oranger"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1096173ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1096173" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/665517">stefafra</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-10">09/10/19 02:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a sample of this after a "fragrance profiling" (yes I am a sucker).<br />
I smell loads of quince, and it stays like that for the rest of the day, with a "walking in a perfume shop" back-up feeling.<br />
I like quinces, making quince jellly, and the wonderful perfume they have, so perhaps I notice it more than people rewieving this perfume that never encountered a quince in real life: think an apple that had a baby with a rose flower.<br />
And talking about rose, I get very little of it in here, or it just melts in the quince: quince and rose jam...<br />
Not sure I want to buy it, but it fits with the season, late summer, early autumn, fruit harvest time, so I think I will finish the sample.<br />
Short range sillage, but for me this is a big pro, as I like to keep perfume for myself and not impose it on other people.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1096173"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1096173#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1079357" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1079357" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stacia79"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/151903"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.151903.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stacia79" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1079357ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1079357" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/151903">stacia79</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-16">07/16/19 13:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A sweet fresh watery rose for people who think they don't like rose. Notes of yuzu, peony, magnolia and freesia lift it up and make it youthful, slightly soapy but definitely a summery feel. Something vegetal in there brings to mind a summer garden in full glory. I can almost see the bees hovering between the blossoms. It does remind me of a gentler, smoother version of Lancome Miracle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1079357"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1079357#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1061009" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1061009" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wagners erda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/937916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.937916.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wagners erda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lanvin/Arpege-6.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Arpge"title="Arpge"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1061009ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1061009" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/937916">wagners erda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-16">05/16/19 09:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get nothing but watery spiciness in this one. I don't pick up any rose or fruity notes. I get a slight spicy powderiness in the drydown and it lasts about an hour inuntil the drydown comes then there is only a hint of spiciness if I put my nose to my wrist. I don't think the perfume is worth the money, but the bottles are divine. I have a set of 10 1.5ml samples that I shall wear every morning and and write my thoughts down on them at the end of the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18719"comment_id="1061009"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Vaara-18719.html?ccid=1061009#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1059198" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
